title: ML Data Basic Schema
description: Information about a set of scientific training data for applying it to machine-learning. This schema servers as a basic for structuring this information and can be extended.

termDefinition.description: Provides information about the human-readable term for a feature or a label, which is optimally defined in a vocabulary. This would support an automated re-featuring or -labeling in case the data needs to be harmonized with other training data. Additional properties could be implemneted to specify for example pre-prpcessing steps for the features and labels.

termValueDataType.description: Defines the data type of the feature or label value, on which the data preprocessin steps depend.

featureProperties.description: The input features of the data for the machine-learning algorithm. Properties will depend on the particular data.

labelProperties.description: The features that represent the output variables (i.e. labels) and will be predicted by the input features.

imageLabelType.description: This is an example for image data, how the label information can be more specified. Additional properties could be implemented for other data types, e.g. text data.
